title: ReleaseParty: GitHub App for automated release posts
description: Rebuild the Release Party prototype (Aureuma/app/rp) as a standalone Go repo that generates Markdown release posts and opens PRs via the ReleaseParty Acolyte GitHub App.

tasks.title: Preflight: Codex login for infra dyad
tasks.description: Ensure `actor-infra` is authenticated so infra/backend tasks can run.

tasks.title: Repo scaffold: ReleaseParty (Go)
tasks.description: Create a standalone git repo `ReleaseParty` with Go backend scaffold, CI placeholders, and docs. Location: /opt/silexa/apps/ReleaseParty.

tasks.title: Backend: GitHub App webhook + installation handling
tasks.description: Implement Go webhook receiver for installation + release events. Verify signatures. Persist installations. Provide install URL endpoint. Use installation tokens to call GitHub API.

tasks.title: Backend: release post pipeline (context -> markdown -> PR)
tasks.description: On release/tag, gather context (release, commits between tags, changelog/diff if possible), generate markdown (template first; LLM pluggable), then open PR with file path template and branch naming.

tasks.title: Ops: docker compose dev run for ReleaseParty
tasks.description: Add a dev docker compose scaffold inside ReleaseParty repo to run backend with env vars via Docker secrets or env files.

tasks.title: Backend: PR idempotency + dedupe
tasks.description: Prevent duplicate PRs for the same repo+tag. Store a stable key (repo+tag) and either reuse/update an existing branch/PR or mark as already processed.

tasks.title: Backend: repo-level config file (.releaseparty.yaml)
tasks.description: Allow repo owners to commit `.releaseparty.yaml` in the source repo to configure blog repo/path template/sections. Backend should read it at release time and merge with DB defaults.

tasks.title: Ops: expose webhook endpoint publicly
tasks.description: Decide deployment (Caddy/Traefik) and ensure `RP_BASE_URL` is https, route `/api/github/webhooks` publicly, and confirm GitHub App webhook delivery succeeds.
